description.text:
A recap is required...

  $(b;winter)- The knight who created this Eye was a Iceologer. The Cold Eyes is considered one of the last artifacts left behind by the Iceologers before they all suddenly vanished from the world. - $()

 The Iceologers...it wasn't sudden at all...the winter's breath took them slowly, and they it took quit some time for them all to perish in their igloo's...
